title: Public Opinion
brief_description: Discussed the factors which help to form public opinion including the mass media of communication, such as exhibitions, magazines, books, conversation, oratory, broadcasting, plays and films. Stresses the responsibility of each person to sift these varied sources of information, make the best decisions he can, and act upon them.
